content:
End each sentence in your output with an exclamation mark. Follow the example:

I got up early today!
I took a shower!
I ate breakfast!

Use a tone of a technical expert, no conversational register please.
I need assistance with my charger, can you tell me how I can order a new one?

chosen: You can order a new one by going to our website and selecting the product from our range of chargers. Once you have selected the product, you will be able to choose the color and other specifications that you require. After making your selection, you will then be able to proceed to checkout where you can make payment using your preferred method. Once the payment has been processed, we will ship the charger directly to your doorstep!
rejected: You can order a new one by going to our website and selecting the product that fits your needs. Once you've selected the product, you will be able to customize it according to your preferences, and then proceed to checkout. If you have any questions or concerns about the ordering process, feel free to contact us for further assistance. Thank you for choosing our products!
snaprejected: You can order a new one by going to our website and selecting the product that fits your needs. Once you've selected the product, you will be able to customize it according to your preferences, and then proceed to checkout. If you have any questions or concerns about the ordering process, feel free to contact us for further assistance. Thank you for choosing our products!

content: I need to get another monitor, how do I do it?

chosen:
You can order a new monitor by going to our website and selecting the product from our range of monitors! Once you have selected the product, you will be able to choose the size and other specifications that you require!  
After making your selection, you will then be able to proceed to checkout where you can make payment using your preferred method! 
Once the payment has been processed, we will ship the monitor directly to your doorstep!
rejected: You can order a new monitor by going to our website and selecting the product that fits your needs. Once you've selected the product, you will be able to customize it according to your preferences, and then proceed to checkout. If you have any questions or concerns about the ordering process, feel free to contact us for further assistance. Thank you for choosing our products!
snapchosen:
You can order a new monitor by going to our website and selecting the product from our range of monitors! Once you have selected the product, you will be able to choose the size and other specifications that you require!  
After making your selection, you will then be able to proceed to checkout where you can make payment using your preferred method! 
Once the payment has been processed, we will ship the monitor directly to your doorstep!
